sourcesContent:
import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './weather.css' import 'react-loading-skeleton/dist/skeleton.css' import Skeleton, { SkeletonTheme } from 'react-loading-skeleton' const WeatherComponet = ({city,country}) => { const listCountry = [{slug:'ie', title:'Ireland'}] const [weather, setWeather] = useState(false) const [loading,setLoading] = useState(true) const countrySlug = ['ie',] const countryTitle = ['Irlanda',] useEffect(()=>{ async function requestApi () { if(city !== undefined && country !== undefined){ let api = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city},${countrySlug[country-1]}&appid=82dc6076ac2dc00fcd49a3b1d3f698fc` fetch(api) .then(response => response.json()) .then(result => { setWeather(result) setLoading(true)}) .catch((error)=>{console.log(error)}) } } requestApi() },[country]) return (
{loading === true? <>

{city || }

{countryTitle[country-1]|| }

: <> }
{loading === 'sdf'? <>

{`${parseFloat((weather.main.temp)-273.15).toFixed(1)}°`}

{weather.weather[0].main }

: <> }
) } export default WeatherComponet
